name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicRectangularTextGauge
desc: A template for displaying a large rectangle containing text and a gauge.

items.name: init(headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has header text, body text, and a gauge.

items.name: init(headerImageProvider: CLKFullColorImageProvider?, headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a header row with an image and text, body text, and a gauge.

items.name: var headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The header text to display in the complication.

items.name: var body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The main body text to display in the complication.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge to display in the complication.
